subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: A judge in Los Angeles will decide if Donald Sterling, the embattled owner of the N.B.A.’s Clippers, is mentally competent to serve as a trustee of the family trust.
snippet: A judge in Los Angeles will decide if Donald Sterling, the embattled owner of the N.B.A.’s Clippers, is mentally competent to serve as a trustee of the family trust.
